resources.string: That does not look like a valid URL. Could you check again?
That URL doesn\'t look like something I can handle. Currently I can make cards only out of YouTube videos.
I couldn\'t find a video ID in that URL. Could you double-check it?
That URL points to a YouTube channel not a video. I can\'t make cards for channels yet.
That URL points to a YouTube playlist not a video. I can\'t make cards for playlists yet.
It looks like you just sent me the domain name. I need the full URL of a YouTube video to make a card.
Sorry, I don\'t recognize this YouTube URL. Could you double-check or try a different link?
The phone doesn\'t seem to have internet access. Would you mind retrying?
It\'s taking a rather long time to download things. Would you mind retrying later?
Could not find video info! Are you sure your link is correct?
Uh, YouTube said something unexpected. You may want to try again a bit later.
There doesn\'t seem to be a thumbnail available for the video :s.
Uh-oh, I could not download the video thumbnail. It may be just a hiccup, but I dunno. Maybe you could retry?
The network seems to be unreachable. Could you check your connection and try again? Or YouTube may be having a bad day.
